TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerable

summary.span: 公开枚举数，该枚举数支持在非泛型集合上进行简单迭代。

span.span: Exposes an enumerator, which supports a simple iteration over a non-generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可枚举的所有非泛型集合的基接口。 is the base interface for all non-generic collections that can be enumerated. 有关此接口的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this interface see . 包含一个方法， ，它将返回。 contains a single method, , which returns an . 提供了通过公开循环访问集合的功能属性和和方法。 provides the ability to iterate through the collection by exposing a property and and methods. 它是实现的最佳做法和上您的集合类，以启用`foreach`(`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 语法，但是实现不是必需的。It is a best practice to implement and on your collection classes to enable the `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic) syntax, however implementing is not required. 如果你的集合不实现，您还是必须遵循为支持此语法通过提供的迭代器模式`GetEnumerator`返回的接口、 类或结构的方法。If your collection does not implement , you must still follow the iterator pattern to support this syntax by providing a `GetEnumerator` method that returns an interface, class or struct. 如果使用 Visual Basic，则必须提供实现，它返回的`GetEnumerator`。When using Visual Basic, you must provide an implementation, which is returned by `GetEnumerator`. 使用 C# 开发时必须提供一个包含类`Current`属性，并`MoveNext`和`Reset`方法如中所述，但类没有实现。When developing with C# you must provide a class that contains a `Current` property, and `MoveNext` and `Reset` methods as described by , but the class does not have to implement . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过实现循环访问的自定义集合的最佳做法和接口。The following code example demonstrates the best practice for iterating a custom collection by implementing the and interfaces. 在此示例中，没有显式调用这些接口的成员，但它们实现以支持使用`foreach`(`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 以循环访问集合。In this example, members of these interfaces are not explicitly called, but they are implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. 此示例是一个完整的控制台应用。This example is a complete Console app. 若要编译 Visual Basic 应用程序，请更改**启动对象**到**Sub Main**在项目的**属性**页。To compile the Visual Basic app, change the **Startup object** to **Sub Main** in the project’s **Properties** page. 有关演示如何实现的示例接口，请参阅[集合类中实现 IEnumerable 接口](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Implementing-the-e1708a24)For a sample that shows how to implement the interface, see [Implementing the IEnumerable Interface in a Collection Class](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Implementing-the-e1708a24) [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]

related.span: 迭代器（C# 和 Visual Basic）
在集合类中实现 IEnumerable 接口

span.span: Implementing the IEnumerable Interface in a Collection Class

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 返回循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `For Each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法也会枚举数放回此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义属性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必须调用方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到将返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returns `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 如果更改到集合中，如添加、 修改或删除元素，枚举器的行为未定义。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中，未显式调用，但它实现以支持使用`foreach`(`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大示例的接口。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]
